transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Ji good morning ma'am.
Executive: Sir, main PS Kaur se baat kar rahi hu. Ye aapko 62.5 KB ka generator PS tha ek sale mein Sonipat se.
Customer: Nahi nahi ma'am.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: IndiaMART inquiry dala tha sir aapne?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi ma'am aapne 9696 pe call kiya hai na?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Ji ma'am, Ankit baat kar raha hu IndiaMART education Noida se aapke account manager.
Customer: Ye mere paas call laga hai ma'am.
Executive: Accha actually kya hai na ye mere pe aayi hui hai to isiliye maine call kiya tha.
Customer: Thik hai main bata deta hu us inquiry ka data aur link kaise nikalta hai, thik hai?
Executive: Bata dijiye.
Customer: Haan ek baar main video meeting ke liye wo bhej raha hu aapko link, thik hai? Screen share kar dete hain fir main bata deta hu kaise karna hai, thik hai?
Executive: Thik hai, thik hai.
Executive: Check kariye ma'am aapko ek video meeting ka link aaya hoga.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan abhi bheja hai sir?
Customer: Ji ma'am.
Executive: Ye wala. Samajh gaya?
Executive: Thik hai haan kar diya.
Executive: Haan usse join kariye video meeting ko.
Executive: Kar diya sir.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ji ab screen share kariye ma'am.
Executive: System se join kara hai na aapne?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Sun nahi aa raha hai share karne ka.
Executive: Nahi niche system se join kara hai na aapne?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To niche third option aata hai wo jo usme box bana hua hai na usme arrow ke nishan hai us pe click kariye. Us pe to click kar rahe hain to entire screen pe kiya but share ka nahi aa raha.
Executive: Entire screen pe click karoge na to chota sa screen mil jayega us pe click karo tab aayega niche share ka.
Executive: Sir kiya haan ho gaya.
Executive: Thik hai ab mujhe dikhaiye kaun sa pehle aap jaiye usme IndiaMART open kariye.
Executive: IndiaMART open karna hai?
Customer: Haan IndiaMART open kariye. System se baat ho sakti hai na apni?
Executive: Haan haan no issue.
Executive: Thik hai main call cut kar raha hu yaha se.
Executive: Speaker nahi hai sir speaker nahi hai usme. Us pe nahi hoga.
Customer: Okay to fir main simple call karta hu thik hai?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received a call regarding inquiry.

- Customer unable to share screen.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to find inquiry data.

- Executive guided on screen sharing process.

- Executive offered to call back on simple call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back on simple call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiry, screen sharing, video meeting
